snippet.title: City Tales - Medieval Era | Announcement Teaser
snippet.description:
Irregular Shapes is happy to present their first trailer for City Tales - Medieval Era, a colorful and chill city builder game with organic growth and a narrative twist!
Build a city teeming with life and meet new companions along the way.

Wishlist now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3265070/City_Tales__Medieval_Era/

------
Join us on Discord! 
https://discord.gg/maRCKmQdGy

- [Twitter](https://x.com/IrrShapes)
